Summary: 3 glowing orange objects in diamond formation moving N-E spotted. No noise appered pulsing dancing along.
divs: Sighting DetailsAt 9:40 pm. from apartment window [open].Spotted 3 glowing orange balls.The size of finger nail at arms lenght.Objects moving west turning and changing formation from diamond to long triangle.Duration of sighting 12-15 seconds.lost visiual contact when they went over building. Estimate altitude of 1000 to1500 feet.NO noise or marker lights noticed. pulsing and dancing around as moving. Dull glow pumpkin orange color.Made calls to airports for rader information request were denied.No photos were taken due to limited time of sighting.Please contact me desire radar information.
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There was one other sighting in New York on or around March 5th 2008
